TI: [Cutaneous-mucosal hyalinosis with cerebral sites. 3 new cases].
AB: The authors report about 3 new cases of cutaneous-mucosal hyalinosis, or Urbach-Wiethe disease, with cerebral sites. The intracranial calcifications were detected without any neurological presenting features, and were discovered incidentally on radiographs of the skull. The CT examination allows specifying the site of these calcifications, in the gyri of the hippocampus.
AD: Service de Neuroradiologie, Institut National de Neurologie, La Rabta, Tunis, Tunisie.
TT: Hyalinose cutaneo-muqueuse avec localisations cerebrales. Trois nouveaux cas.
MH: Lipoid Proteinosis of Urbach and Wiethe/*diagnostic imaging
